name: nonprofit-email-service
description: A cost effective, open source solution to sending mass emails

APP_ID.description: A unique identifier for your app.

MASTER_KEY.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

SERVER_URL.description: URL to connect to your Heroku instance (update with your app's name + PARSE_MOUNT)

APP_NAME.description: The name of the app that will show up in the dashboard.
